Dusty Veil
Fine Veil

"Futility"
Veil
Crooked Staff, Chipped Sword Breaker
Mended Staff, Reforged Sword Breaker
Dark Staff, Sharp Sword Breaker

{colour_start|notable}If HP below 70 % {colour_end}
{colour_start|notable}If HP below 40 % {colour_end}
{colour_start|notable}If HP below 10 % {colour_end}
PAST LIFE REGRESSION
NO REST, NO PEACE
COLD TOUCH OF DEATH
STUDY NECROMANTIC SCROLLS

Neither dead nor alive, cursed and hiding from prying eyes, the Veiled has learned the same powers that caused his condition. He’s full of hate towards the undead, yet after ages of suffering he is in control of the same strange necromancy. It is not intended for reviving the dead, but for salvaging those not yet departed. His strength grows as he nears death, as the closer he gets to freeing himself from his damnation, the harder it is to keep this energy under control.

The only purpose of his veil is to hide his unholy body from anyone’s sight. The staff merely helps the Veiled to control his curse, and force it to submit to his will. His swordbreaker might seem to be for self-defense, yet its purpose is to weaken his foes even further.

Unable to feel the warmth of fire, taste food, or see dreams, the Veiled eschews others’ company and gets absorbed in his ancient, imperishable memories. Solitude either brings him peace, or strengthens his regrets. But if necessary, he will give his life force to anyone who might need it more than him.
Martyr's Crown
Blasphemer's Crown
Courageous Vessel
Selfless Vessel
Bride's Veil
Mortal's Failure
Crystalline Veins
Self's Epitaph
Hone-Onna's Visage
"At last, I share her dreadful fate."
"It would give its all to feel again."
"Fragile, yet indestructable creation."

A Fate Worse Than Death
A veiled stranger has approached our Hamlet. While we can not be sure about the black mists that cling to him, he states his intentions are benign.
A Story Of Tragedy
The hamlet has organized a play! The script has been provided by a man wrapped in veils. It tells of a tragedy where a mortal, struck by grief, is left to a fate of uncertainty and sorrow.
La Danse Macabre
The veil between life and death seems woefully thin this week. We can only cast our eyes skyward towards the cloying mists that plague our Hamlet, and pray for the dead and living alike.
How long have I waited! Unmake me! UNMAKE ME NOW!
Pointless! I am senseless!
Insentient and foul.
Disgusting abominations! Your death was defiled!
I've seen this vicious mastery before.
I’ve been there. Don’t make me remember!
She was the gift I’ve never been worthy of…
This is mildly inconvenient.
You're ruining my veils!
There's nothing on me to eat!
I don't need air anyways.
Stop holding and touching me!
I can't swim with these clothes!
We must leave the little pig until last!
Bring death to the prince first!
Fools, do not attack the tiny one!
This will be interesting.
I look forward to the carnage.
Please, blast me to bits!
Bring me over there!
It speaks of doom, but not mine?
Please, foretell my death!
Touch her and I'll rip your bones out of your body.
How can I live without her...
Life is meaningless if she is not with me!
"Take my hand and never leave me..."
(hums)
Wh-where am I?
I saw her again...
This foolish, intoxicating feeling has already ruined my life enough!
This unsightly fish is not nearly as beautiful as she was...
Such a beautiful delusion.
My body is empty, but my soul is trapped!
How mesmerizing! What cruelty!
Turn me into ash!
...Never thought I'd see one like me.
Put him out of his misery! It's a mercy!
You must be grateful that you can feel this pain!
Fascinating...
Torn to pieces!
Turn to dust!
The veil parts for you!
Return to your maker!
Such an exquisite end!
I envy you.
Darkness takes you!
Your life is so easily taken!
HAHAHAHA!
It can’t be... IT CAN’T BE!
I SHOULD BE DEAD, WHY DO I FEEL IT?!
WHY IS SUCH A THROE GIVEN TO ME?!
I bleed...? I BLEED!
OH, HOW I MISSED THIS SENSATION! AHAHA!
I CAN FEEL MY VEINS EMPTY! SUCH BLISS!
Oooh... This sensation, sweeter than any nectar...!
It eats away at my body!
I can see my body dissolve. Fascinating.
Maybe this could turn me to dust.
Hundred years of solitude...
Don't take me back to that day!
She deserved better...
I... need a moment...
His visage haunts me!
I can't control... myself...!
My body is lighter than I am used to!
I drift like a rag on the wind!
I am no novice to dancing, but it's not what I...!
My body moves and sways!
My knees buckle, my head spins!
Oh, wonderful.
Just what I didn't need.
Why do you torture me so?
Forces more vile than mine!
A strength that carries on beyond!
Don't you dare touch me again!
Let us not tarry with their end.
We must bring about their death. Let us not wait.
Death waits for none but I.
Every one of them will fall!
What?!
Are they... dead? Alive? What?
I don't trust this respite...
A scant moment of rest.
A delusion of peace.
MY MIND IS WEAK!
I CAN NOT BEAR IT!
THE DARKNESS IS OVERWHELMING!
This place holds nothing of use to me.
There’s nothing here for me, send me elsewhere.
What a cruel joke.
I ask you to stop tormenting me.
Take me with you, I seek my downfall.
It's a beautiful day to die.
My end is somewhere out there. Please, take me along.
Allow me to accompany your next foray.
I'd have preferred if my mind were unbreakable, rather than my body.
The mind is such a fragile thing... So lamentable.
I knew it would not be easy to find my end.
All I find is horror instead of death.
The mind is so much weaker than the body...
What am I even trying to do?
Even now, the memories of that day haunt me...
Merely existing is such a torture.]
One living corpse is enough.
Someone has to watch over your buried hirelings, don't you think so?
Will I finally meet my end here?
I've come from far to meet my demise here.
Such a dark and desolate place. It suits me well.
Such a somber atmosphere. Perfect.
Take me with you! My death is out there!
Such base merriment.
Fine, fine. I will go.
I guess I've got some parlour tricks.
Time to pick up a new hobby.
Watch my thumb disappear!
What do you mean, "Toss those bones"?
Higher. No, lower.
This place is far too noisy and rowdy.
I've had plenty of solitude. I guess I can do with a bit more.
What's this about breathing in and out?
I shall reflect on my failures and success.
Mortality. Such a complex thing...
Even more time to think.
Wish that I could doze off.
Where is your "Light" now?
I can try, but there is no difference in which tale you believe the most.
The Light didn't save me at a fateful moment, why would it now?
I remain skeptical at most, but alright.
Show yourself, Light. Prove yourself to me.
Such amusing folly.
Hapless sheep need something to believe in.
The mind is fallible. It must be preserved until my demise.
Well, I can't help but feel a bit hollow, you see...
Mists, guide me on this journey of rehabilitation.
So in the end, it all comes down to that day.
Existential crisis? Me?
It's not just haphephobia.
It makes no sense.
Don't be scared of what you're about to see.
Can this be done without touching me? No?
That syringe is useless. Trust me.
Don't bother getting a transfusion.
Hands off! I will operate myself!
Yes! This is perfect!
Incredible! A swift end for me!
Please, I beg you to send me in here!
These weaklings can't even harm me.
How am I to find my end here?
Nothing here would be capable of killing me.
I'll seek my end anywhere EXCEPT there.
To think that even worse fates exist.
My life is a mercy compared to what is down there.
This accursed place is even more foul than I am!
Flesh and stone is infallible, bones and psyche are not.
Fascinating.
Amendable.
Yes, yes. Very good.
How quaint.
I've already tempered my expectations.
Oh well.
Get used to disappointment.
Unfazing.
Oh, no. How awful.
Hm. Less than pleasant.
I'm used to worse.
...And that's all?
Touch me again, I dare you.
My feet are not your pavement!
Careful with my garbs.
Let's find my demise.
Here we go once more.
Onwards, into darkness and death.
Let's go. Something here ought to be my end.
Stop.
Hold on.
Something's amiss.
Rest for my bones.
This familiar darkness.
Torches are spent and snuffed, just like lives.
It's not like I can see much anyways.
A night as hollow as my body.
Don't trip and hit me.
Careful where you go. Wouldn't want you bumping into me.
A beautiful night to meet our demise, no?
They'll fight harder now. Good.
A stygian darkness for fiends of the depths.
The spirit falters...
Yes! Just so! Bring doom upon me!
Condemn me all you wish!
This suffering is meaningless!
Cease the torment and end me!
What is dead may never die!
So close, yet I feel nothing.
I feel nothing!
I am deprived of the gift of life! I cannot lose it!
A pity.
So disempowering.
It was not meant to be.
Try even harder.
Again!
I would spit blood in your face if I could.
It's like hitting sacks of hay, isn't it?
Beautiful!
Feel the life that yet clings to you.
You spill life so easily.
Cease your bragging.
Try not to actually die.
Oh yes, I am very envious.
Excellent work. You did not die.
Oh. How anticlimactic.
Commendable display. Now cease torturing me.
Past memories... Times in which everything was well...
I shall depart my body. Do not interrupt me.
The person who dares touch me while meditating, dies.
I am wretched and infallible.
No rest for the wicked.
Rest is for the living. Vengeance is for the undead.
I shall begrudingly let you touch my hand for this ritual.
(dark, whispered chanting)
Feel the uncaring cold of death, and shrug it off.
Guess it's an all-nighter as usual.
I'll stay watch. I have some time to kill anyways.
It never hurts to be doubly prepared.
At least you aren't a walking corpse.
Oh, it could be so much worse!
What I wouldn't give to be warm and cozy like you right now.
How did this work again?
Sorry, I don't really know how to treat flesh wounds.
This bone goes there, but what about this organ?
Fate is something you defy.
I don't believe in any gods, but I feel as if something is watching over you.
Know that you have my full support in this journey to get me killed.
Death comes in the darkest night!
My end rides on black wings!
Doom is upon us!
This is a nightmare for us all!
Our minds falter and bones shake.
Prison of flesh or bone, neither protects the soul.
Good to see you are all doing well. Good to see...
I do believe we've got this under control.
A strong mind makes for a strong body.
We are close to our ends!
Aaah, the thrill of release!
We are so close to our sweet unmaking!
You've got plenty of blood to spill. Wish I still could.
This is rather boring, don't you think?
So hale and hearty. How good for you.
I am close to my end! I can feel it!
Soon... Soon...!
At last, I am close to my death. Tomorrow, let me meet it.
I'm still far away from my demise.
Why do you keep me alive? Please, stop treating me.
Wish I'd taken more blows.
Excellent. My soul will not fall before my cage does.
I am prepared to meet my end head-on.
Like this, I can go without regrets.
These hands still have much left to do...
Her face... I... I...
What will I leave behind? A legacy, or her ruin?
We are in excellent condition. Onwards, let's find my end - and soon!
Mists carry and guide us. They shall lead us to deliverance.
Woe to those who face us. Only the worthy shall end me.
This is how we shall all meet our end!
It seems misery does love company.
Isn't it exhilarating? To have one foot in the grave?
No more respite. We march to my end.
The warmth of the fire is behind us, now.
Good, finally we can get about to meeting my maker.
Maybe I could starve to death, were it less unpleasant.
Hm. We need more sustenance to last all of you.
Oh? Out of food? ...Is that a bad thing?
Excellent. Sustenance to last a long while.
The rations will get us deep enough to find a worthy foe.
Seems like no one's about to starve anytime soon.
Plenty of wood left for a second campfire.
Oh, great, yet another excuse to set up camp and dally.
Mayhaps we could use all this firewood to burn me to ash. No?
This place is worse than I've imagined. Still, you are doing just fine.
Excellent work today, all of you. Now rest.
This reminds me of that time in the Warrens--just without all the swine.
I am glad I got to experience this together with you all.
When I finally die, it shall be smiling by your sides.
Must... Touch... !
What have we got here?
Something to lay my hands on!
And what could this be?
Fascinating!
How droll. Let me see.
I wonder if this could empower me...
Oh, the sins I've committed...
No one will notice.
This could assist in my doom!
Maybe the Light could help me, after all?
At last, a chance to cleanse these veils.
What a fantastic way to inflict death upon myself!
Such wonderful garbs and striking poise!
I shall be entombed with riches!
Wait, why do I need to drink?
Glittering riches to adorn my grave!
Oh, how it still has flesh on its bones!
I'm honestly not sure why, but I must try it!
Maybe it holds clues on my demise!
Maybe it's not too late to become religious, after all...
I must exorcise this cursed body!
Somehow, I feel like hoarding food.
...And tucked away.
The body is imperishable, but horrors still impact me!
My mind can not take much more!
Please, I don't deserve another eternity of torture!
THE WEAKNESS OF THE PSYCHE!
(gasps)
MY SOUL FALTERS!
My mind will crumble before my body does!
I do not wish for more torment!
Let my suffering end - Please!
I have no time for any of this!
I must tend to my powers, lest something bad happen.
They're still out there...
An instrument of torment?
Damnations for eternity.
Such a cruel world we live in.
Onwards to find more suffering.
Can't we turn back?
The mists give me a bad feeling about this...
Don't get close to me!
Please, no closer!
Stay away from me, lest you share the same suffering!
They will make no lapse twice in a row.
Prepare yourself - the next will hit.
An omen of the incoming darkness!
Am I next?
Will I be made to suffer?
The mists holds no power to protect you.
You fool!
Now what will they do to me?
Expect a painful retaliation.
They won't make this mistake twice!
They toy with me!
They know I am but an immortal plaything.
Why do I not feel pain?!
I am merely a plaything!
Condemned to an eternity of this anguish!
Please, do not stress me out further.
I wish I could sleep...
Another dark night, alone with my thoughts.
What am I to do?
I'm trying to think of a god to pray to!
No, this can't be happening!
Get me away from these horrible specters!
I can not bear the sight of them!
I no longer wish to partake in this!
I'm in no hurry to meet my end!
I-It can wait, trust me!
I've , uh... forgotten something! Don't send me down!
I know you're trying to look under the veil!
Stop tugging at my clothes!
Touch me one more time and I'll cut your hands off!
I KNEW IT! I NEVER SHOULD HAVE TRUST-
DON'T TOUCH ME! DO NOT TOUCH ME!
STOP CLAWING AT ME!
Let go of my garbs!
Stop staring at me!
Keep your hands where they belong!
Is this blighted, perhaps?
Are you so sadistic as to remind me of my past life?
I don't need this, and you should know.
Stay away, or I will cast you into the fire!
(holds up his swordbreaker in a threatening gesture)
You shall not stare under the veil!
My threats are not merely hot air.
I warned you that I wouldn't help. Yet, you all kept it up.
I will not be touching nor helping anyone at all tonight.
Back off!
I do not need this "help" of yours.
Your elbow nearly touched me!
I don't need your flimsy excuses!
Touch me and you lose that hand.
I need no "ministrations" of yours!
Stay away!
Don't get so close!
Keep your distance from me!
Don't you dare administer that to me!
I'll use items myself! Get away!
You carry no permission to touch me, remember?
Your feet will not touch mine!
Keep your damnable feet where they belong!
Budge even an inch closer and I will stab you.
The mists whisper secrets!
Very clever.
I can sense the beating of your lying heart.
Playing up this scheme, huh?
Your actions will not trick me!
I see past the veil of your lies.
You know what happens to those who dare touch me?!
Try that again! I will MURDER you!
Oh mists, they nearly touched me!
THEY TOUCHED ME!!
HOW DARE YOU?!
I SHALL HAVE THEIR HEADS! RIGHT THIS MOMENT!!
That diversion won't work on me!
You think I haven't picked up on your clever scheme?
Darkness cries out at your infidelity!
This is what you get for touching me!
They were not empty threats!
Repent for your wandering hands!
Stay at least five meters away!
Don't even dare look my way.
I'll find out what you are scheming.
Do not even think about it!
I sense trickery!
I know what you are scheming!
That is merely a ruse!
I will not suffer your petty tricks.
You hold no sway over my power.
I TOLD YOU TO STOP TOUCHING ME!
(frantic movements)
You! I must get away from you!
I will not partake in your scheme!
Send another fool in my stead!
I will not slaver away for your wicked games!
AHAHAHAHA!
Try and tear me apart!
My immortal husk shall take all your beatings!
ONLY THE SOUL IS PERISHABLE!
UNLIKE MY BODY, THE PSYCHE FALTERS!
MY MIND IS MY SOLE WEAKNESS!
Kill me! Kill me, at last!
Just try to murder me!
I can not die! I am already dead!
I need my health to be lower!
No thanks, they're pointless.
I don't need useless rations.
You may try, but I refuse!
Stop actively making it worse!
Why are you so insistent on prolonging my suffering?
We'll be fine!
Neither me nor you have need for this.
Nothing can help prevent your deaths.
Do not veil my pain any further!
But why? I long for death!
Do not toy with me!
I am trying to die over here!
Why would you do that?
I'm currently trying to meet my end.
Hmm... Not lethal enough.
This trap is pathetic. Not enough.
Ooh, visceral. Interesting.
Could this unmake me?
Interesting. But how could I apply it?
Seems a bit impractical, but I could try this...
Come and strike this fiend down!
Kill this wretched monster!
Unmake me at once, you monster!
I shall become dust!
Death begets death!
Death comes to us all!
I need no sleep nor rest - only combat!
Only combat can get me killed!
Let us go further and find something to kill me!
Face and fight me!
Strike me down!
Slay this cursed wanderer!
I! Will! Feel! Pain!
Why was I made immortal?!
I crave death!
No! Not while I still hold wicked life!
I am no coward to my fate!
I wish for the embrace of death!
Yes! Bring me closer to death!
Unmake me further!
Envelop me in the darkness of death!
No! Hit me!
Alas, it was not meant to be.
I shall never know death like this!
Yes! Just so! Now do that to me!
Me next! Me next!
Shatter me and break me to dust!
I am here to receive my punishment!
Judgment must be mete out upon me!
But then where else am I to meet my end?
I need no ministrations!
These are wasted upon me!
I'm trying to die over here, you fool!
Onwards, to find something to kill me!
Let us meet my end!
Let us move towards my demise!
Return me down there at once!
I've returned, just to suffer again?
Why did I survive? Please, I must meet my end!
I sit amidst ignorant fleshlings.
The flesh on your bones marks you.
You don't know how good you have it, ignorant fools.
YOU PESTILENT HUSKS!
YOU DAMNABLE FLESHBAGS!
YOU ROTTEN FODDER!
Savor your life while it lasts.
You dumb, incompetent fools.
I would rather be dead than incapable like you.
Not by a meatsack like you.
What do you know of helping something like me?
No, your inadequacies do not help.
Learn to fight with your own strength.
Leave me alone, before I turn my power upon you.
You piles of guts and flesh do not deserve my help.
Get moving with those meaty legs!
Move those useless feet.
Get a move on already!
I don't think so, guts for brains.
No, you shall not, fool.
You are an idiot to think I would. Phah!
Your just dessert, pig.
Just don't bleed on my veil.
Ugh, the idiot bleeds. How enviable.
A pathetic strike.
You take life without grace.
There is no skill in how you bring death.
Absolutely worthless.
You miss, much like you miss a purpose.
We would be better off without this bloodbag.
I shall make you enjoy pain!
Appreciate the gift of your weak flesh!
Suffer! It makes life all the better!
You weaklings need rest?
Oh, right. The mortals need their pitiful sleep.
Rest is for the living - and truly weak ones at that.
The dead have no pity for you!
Try to keep up, fleshbags.
My logic is simply above your simple minds.
I can't bear to walk among these simpletons.
This Hamlet is full of the unwashed, uneducated masses.
This place is awful. I'd rather die in a ditch.
Alone, our hero stands against the storm!
This bleak tale needs a protagonist!
I shall lead this tale! Hahaha!
AND SO, IN THE DARKEST PEAK, OUR HERO FALTERS!
A TRAGIC END TO THIS WOEFUL TALE!
WILL OUR HERO PERISH OR PERSEVERE?!
Witness the clash between these vile forces!
The sound of combat! How utterly delightful!
Shrieks and groans! Bloodied hacking and laboured breathing!
Instead, fetch me more paper and pens!
I need help noting down today's happenings.
This will make for an excellent play, yes!
A tantalizing offer!
For my efforts, of course.
Spoils for our hero!
Our entourage wanders on!
Thus our hero continued his journey.
The dark knight travels on!
The fumbling fool!
This jokester is ruining my play!
And try as he might, our nitwit fails once more.
Thus the squire struck, and struck true!
...And his companion landed a blow...
Bravo! Can you perform that again?
A frontal assault! Our hero takes it head on!
How will our valiant knight get out of this?
Reeling! Dazed! The dark knight staggers!
I have yet more to write and tell!
But I need to hit my deadline!
...And thus his companions sat down at the fire.
You damnable copycat!
And thus our hero... did this!
I must improvise to continue!
Our protagonist shall lead the charge!
Onwards, valiant hero!
Our dark knight presses on!
The hero must recuperate!
A brief moment of solace for our protagonist!
The blackened knight takes solace and rest!
I am the writer of this tale! Not you!
I will not co-write this epic!
Excuse me, but I am the playwriter here.
I shall lavish in these accolades and riches.
I demand my very own stage! A troupe and entourage!
You should pay me for the honor of meeting me.
How can I even speak? I have no lungs!
My unliving corpse shall know no rest.
I still live merely to suffer over and over.
HOW IS THIS EVEN POSSIBLE?!
I HAVE NO HEART TO STILL!
THIS SHOULD NOT HAPPEN!
I will never know peace.
Every waking moment, I suffer.
I am tormented by existence itself.
Wait, why do I even need food?
Why do I require this?
Why does it harm me to not eat?
I am forsaken and alone. Leave me be.
Try as you might, you could not help me.
A pointless gesture.
Why would I grant myself any of these comforts?
I know my limits.
I am lost in my own shadows and mist.
Do not impede my impending release!
This immortal husk holds no such needs.
Your aid is unnecessary.
I need to be at death's door for my full effectiveness.
The mists disagree.
The closer I am to death, the darker my might becomes.
Just how many more of these might there be?
Maybe I should just be the meatshield for these.
Let me try to disarm them with my body.
Great. On we go.
Sigh...
Oh, for dark's sake.
I can't even ingest most of these!
Material goods can not end my suffering.
My crisis goes beyond the physical.
A worthless attempt.
You but delay the inevitable.
Death shall come, as sure as my torment.
Damnable immortality!
I hate this fleshless body!
I wish to die!
Try to end my futile unlife.
Make me suffer! Make me feel something!
Futile. It is all futile. Come.
I crave the sensation of sleep.
Oh, to be able to tune it all out...

RÉGRESSION DANS LA VIE ANTÉRIEURE
PAS DE REPOS, PAS DE PAIX
TOUCHER FROID DE LA MORT
ÉTUDE DES PARCHEMINS NÉCROMANTIQUES

Ni mort ni vivant, maudit et se cachant des regards indiscrets, le Voilé a appris les mêmes pouvoirs qui ont causé sa condition. Il est plein de haine envers les morts-vivants, et pourtant, après des âges de souffrance, il maîtrise la même étrange nécromancie. Elle n'est pas destinée à faire revivre les morts, mais à sauver ceux qui ne sont pas encore partis. Sa force augmente à mesure qu'il s'approche de la mort, car plus il se rapproche de la libération de sa damnation, plus il lui est difficile de garder cette énergie sous contrôle.

Le seul but de son voile est de cacher son corps impie à la vue de tous. Le bâton aide simplement le Voilé à contrôler sa malédiction, et à la forcer à se soumettre à sa volonté. Son brise-épée peut sembler être pour l'auto-défense, mais son but est d'affaiblir encore plus ses ennemis.

Incapable de ressentir la chaleur du feu, de goûter la nourriture ou de voir des rêves, le Voilé évite la compagnie des autres et s'absorbe dans ses souvenirs anciens et impérissables. La solitude lui apporte la paix ou renforce ses regrets. Mais si nécessaire, il donnera sa force vitale à quiconque en aurait plus besoin que lui.

Un destin pire que la mort
Un étranger veilleur s'est approché de notre Hammeau. Bien que nous ne puissions être sûrs des brumes noires qui s'accrochent à lui, il affirme que ses intentions sont bénignes.
Une histoire tragique

Le hameau a organisé une pièce de théâtre ! Le scénario a été fourni par un homme enveloppé de voiles. Il raconte une tragédie où un mortel, frappé par le chagrin, est abandonné à un destin d'incertitude et de chagrin.
La Danse Macabre

Le voile entre la vie et la mort semble tristement mince cette semaine. Nous ne pouvons que jeter nos yeux vers le ciel en direction des brumes étouffantes qui gangrènent notre Hamlet, et prier pour les morts comme pour les vivants.

PAST LIFE REGRESSION
NO REST, NO PEACE
COLD TOUCH OF DEATH
STUDY NECROMANTIC SCROLLS

Neither dead nor alive, cursed and hiding from prying eyes, the Veiled has learned the same powers that caused his condition. He’s full of hate towards the undead, yet after ages of suffering he is in control of the same strange necromancy. It is not intended for reviving the dead, but for salvaging those not yet departed. His strength grows as he nears death, as the closer he gets to freeing himself from his damnation, the harder it is to keep this energy under control.

The only purpose of his veil is to hide his unholy body from anyone’s sight. The staff merely helps the Veiled to control his curse, and force it to submit to his will. His swordbreaker might seem to be for self-defense, yet its purpose is to weaken his foes even further.

Unable to feel the warmth of fire, taste food, or see dreams, the Veiled eschews others’ company and gets absorbed in his ancient, imperishable memories. Solitude either brings him peace, or strengthens his regrets. But if necessary, he will give his life force to anyone who might need it more than him.

A Fate Worse Than Death
A veiled stranger has approached our Hamlet. While we can not be sure about the black mists that cling to him, he states his intentions are benign.
A Story Of Tragedy
The hamlet has organized a play! The script has been provided by a man wrapped in veils. It tells of a tragedy where a mortal, struck by grief, is left to a fate of uncertainty and sorrow.
La Danse Macabre
The veil between life and death seems woefully thin this week. We can only cast our eyes skyward towards the cloying mists that plague our Hamlet, and pray for the dead and living alike.

Hm. We need more sustenance to last all of you.
Oh? Out of food? ...Is that a bad thing?
Excellent. Sustenance to last a long while.
The rations will get us deep enough to find a worthy foe.
Seems like no one's about to starve anytime soon.
Plenty of wood left for a second campfire.
Oh, great, yet another excuse to set up camp and dally.
Mayhaps we could use all this firewood to burn me to ash. No?
This place is worse than I've imagined. Still, you are doing just fine.
Excellent work today, all of you. Now rest.
This reminds me of that time in the Warrens--just without all the swine.
I am glad I got to experience this together with you all.
When I finally die, it shall be smiling by your sides.
Must... Touch... !
What have we got here?
Something to lay my hands on!
And what could this be?
Fascinating!
How droll. Let me see.
I wonder if this could empower me...
Oh, the sins I've committed...
No one will notice.
This could assist in my doom!
Maybe the Light could help me, after all?
At last, a chance to cleanse these veils.
What a fantastic way to inflict death upon myself!
Such wonderful garbs and striking poise!
I shall be entombed with riches!
Wait, why do I need to drink?
Glittering riches to adorn my grave!
Oh, how it still has flesh on its bones!
I'm honestly not sure why, but I must try it!
Maybe it holds clues on my demise!
Maybe it's not too late to become religious, after all...
I must exorcise this cursed body!
Somehow, I feel like hoarding food.
...And tucked away.
The body is imperishable, but horrors still impact me!
My mind can not take much more!
Please, I don't deserve another eternity of torture!
THE WEAKNESS OF THE PSYCHE!
(gasps)
MY SOUL FALTERS!
My mind will crumble before my body does!
I do not wish for more torment!
Let my suffering end - Please!
I have no time for any of this!
I must tend to my powers, lest something bad happen.
They're still out there...
An instrument of torment?
Damnations for eternity.
Such a cruel world we live in.
Onwards to find more suffering.
Can't we turn back?
The mists give me a bad feeling about this...
Don't get close to me!
Please, no closer!
Stay away from me, lest you share the same suffering!
They will make no lapse twice in a row.
Prepare yourself - the next will hit.
An omen of the incoming darkness!
Am I next?
Will I be made to suffer?
The mists holds no power to protect you.
You fool!
Now what will they do to me?
Expect a painful retaliation.
They won't make this mistake twice!
They toy with me!
They know I am but an immortal plaything.
Why do I not feel pain?!
I am merely a plaything!
Condemned to an eternity of this anguish!
Please, do not stress me out further.
I wish I could sleep...
Another dark night, alone with my thoughts.
What am I to do?
I'm trying to think of a god to pray to!
No, this can't be happening!
Get me away from these horrible specters!
I can not bear the sight of them!
I no longer wish to partake in this!
I'm in no hurry to meet my end!
I-It can wait, trust me!
I've , uh... forgotten something! Don't send me down!
I know you're trying to look under the veil!
Stop tugging at my clothes!
Touch me one more time and I'll cut your hands off!
I KNEW IT! I NEVER SHOULD HAVE TRUST-
DON'T TOUCH ME! DO NOT TOUCH ME!
STOP CLAWING AT ME!
Let go of my garbs!
Stop staring at me!
Keep your hands where they belong!
Is this blighted, perhaps?
Are you so sadistic as to remind me of my past life?
I don't need this, and you should know.
Stay away, or I will cast you into the fire!
(holds up his swordbreaker in a threatening gesture)
You shall not stare under the veil!
My threats are not merely hot air.
I warned you that I wouldn't help. Yet, you all kept it up.
I will not be touching nor helping anyone at all tonight.
Back off!
I do not need this "help" of yours.
Your elbow nearly touched me!
I don't need your flimsy excuses!
Touch me and you lose that hand.
I need no "ministrations" of yours!
Stay away!
Don't get so close!
Keep your distance from me!
Don't you dare administer that to me!
I'll use items myself! Get away!
You carry no permission to touch me, remember?
Your feet will not touch mine!
Keep your damnable feet where they belong!
Budge even an inch closer and I will stab you.
The mists whisper secrets!
Very clever.
I can sense the beating of your lying heart.
Playing up this scheme, huh?
Your actions will not trick me!
I see past the veil of your lies.
You know what happens to those who dare touch me?!
Try that again! I will MURDER you!
Oh mists, they nearly touched me!
THEY TOUCHED ME!!
HOW DARE YOU?!
I SHALL HAVE THEIR HEADS! RIGHT THIS MOMENT!!
That diversion won't work on me!
You think I haven't picked up on your clever scheme?
Darkness cries out at your infidelity!
This is what you get for touching me!
They were not empty threats!
Repent for your wandering hands!
Stay at least five meters away!
Don't even dare look my way.
I'll find out what you are scheming.
Do not even think about it!
I sense trickery!
I know what you are scheming!
That is merely a ruse!
I will not suffer your petty tricks.
You hold no sway over my power.
I TOLD YOU TO STOP TOUCHING ME!
(frantic movements)
You! I must get away from you!
I will not partake in your scheme!
Send another fool in my stead!
I will not slaver away for your wicked games!
AHAHAHAHA!
Try and tear me apart!
My immortal husk shall take all your beatings!
ONLY THE SOUL IS PERISHABLE!
UNLIKE MY BODY, THE PSYCHE FALTERS!
MY MIND IS MY SOLE WEAKNESS!
Kill me! Kill me, at last!
Just try to murder me!
I can not die! I am already dead!
I need my health to be lower!
No thanks, they're pointless.
I don't need useless rations.
You may try, but I refuse!
Stop actively making it worse!
Why are you so insistent on prolonging my suffering?
We'll be fine!
Neither me nor you have need for this.
Nothing can help prevent your deaths.
Do not veil my pain any further!
But why? I long for death!
Do not toy with me!
I am trying to die over here!
Why would you do that?
I'm currently trying to meet my end.
Hmm... Not lethal enough.
This trap is pathetic. Not enough.
Ooh, visceral. Interesting.
Could this unmake me?
Interesting. But how could I apply it?
Seems a bit impractical, but I could try this...
Come and strike this fiend down!
Kill this wretched monster!
Unmake me at once, you monster!
I shall become dust!
Death begets death!
Death comes to us all!
I need no sleep nor rest - only combat!
Only combat can get me killed!
Let us go further and find something to kill me!
Face and fight me!
Strike me down!
Slay this cursed wanderer!
I! Will! Feel! Pain!
Why was I made immortal?!
I crave death!
No! Not while I still hold wicked life!
I am no coward to my fate!
I wish for the embrace of death!
Yes! Bring me closer to death!
Unmake me further!
Envelop me in the darkness of death!
No! Hit me!
Alas, it was not meant to be.
I shall never know death like this!
Yes! Just so! Now do that to me!
Me next! Me next!
Shatter me and break me to dust!
I am here to receive my punishment!
Judgment must be mete out upon me!
But then where else am I to meet my end?
I need no ministrations!
These are wasted upon me!
I'm trying to die over here, you fool!
Onwards, to find something to kill me!
Let us meet my end!
Let us move towards my demise!
Return me down there at once!
I've returned, just to suffer again?
Why did I survive? Please, I must meet my end!
I sit amidst ignorant fleshlings.
The flesh on your bones marks you.
You don't know how good you have it, ignorant fools.
YOU PESTILENT HUSKS!
YOU DAMNABLE FLESHBAGS!
YOU ROTTEN FODDER!
Savor your life while it lasts.
You dumb, incompetent fools.
I would rather be dead than incapable like you.
Not by a meatsack like you.
What do you know of helping something like me?
No, your inadequacies do not help.
Learn to fight with your own strength.
Leave me alone, before I turn my power upon you.
You piles of guts and flesh do not deserve my help.
Get moving with those meaty legs!
Move those useless feet.
Get a move on already!
I don't think so, guts for brains.
No, you shall not, fool.
You are an idiot to think I would. Phah!
Your just dessert, pig.
Just don't bleed on my veil.
Ugh, the idiot bleeds. How enviable.
A pathetic strike.
You take life without grace.
There is no skill in how you bring death.
Absolutely worthless.
You miss, much like you miss a purpose.
We would be better off without this bloodbag.
I shall make you enjoy pain!
Appreciate the gift of your weak flesh!
Suffer! It makes life all the better!
You weaklings need rest?
Oh, right. The mortals need their pitiful sleep.
Rest is for the living - and truly weak ones at that.
The dead have no pity for you!
Try to keep up, fleshbags.
My logic is simply above your simple minds.
I can't bear to walk among these simpletons.
This Hamlet is full of the unwashed, uneducated masses.
This place is awful. I'd rather die in a ditch.
Alone, our hero stands against the storm!
This bleak tale needs a protagonist!
I shall lead this tale! Hahaha!
AND SO, IN THE DARKEST PEAK, OUR HERO FALTERS!
A TRAGIC END TO THIS WOEFUL TALE!
WILL OUR HERO PERISH OR PERSEVERE?!

The sound of combat! How utterly delightful!
Shrieks and groans! Bloodied hacking and laboured breathing!

Spoils for our hero!

Let me try to disarm them with my body.
Great. On we go.
Sigh...
Oh, for dark's sake.

My crisis goes beyond the physical.

Damnable immortality!
I hate this fleshless body!
I wish to die!
Try to end my futile unlife.
Make me suffer! Make me feel something!
Futile. It is all futile. Come.

Oh, to be able to tune it all out...
This is where you'll all die. In the dark.
It does not matter.
We are all but figments and dust.
Why do I feel the sudden need to lash out at random?
Why is it that I can even take damage?

This stress... It is simply too much.
I beg you to put me out of my mercy.
Unmake my soul, if you can not end my body.
The mists that bind me are too powerful.
(sighs, forlorn)
How cruel this life is to me.
All I wished for was a happy ending.
I should have gone elsewhere.
I seek my end, but I am woefully unprepared.
Am I merely escaping from my wrongdoings without facing reality?

Do I sense blood and organs within me ?
I live! I breathe!

AH, THE SHINE OF THE SUN...
NO! I DON'T WANT TO DIE!

Let us cease this violence! I am too partial to my flesh!

Haha! HAHAHA!

As certain as the moon will rise.

Go, sever the thread of their life.

Grant them the end I so desire.
I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!

The fog of death is upon them!

I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!

I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!

Hilarious.

That's all?
Pathetic.
We will walk this road to the end!

You'll succeed next time. I know it!

Ah yes, let's try eating. Great idea.

I'm literally not even skin over bones!
If I can't die, you shall!
Do! Not! Touch! Me!
The only mistake I've made is that I care!
If I can't die, you shall!

The only mistake I've made is that I care!
Care to sing a shanty with the dead?

REGRESSIONE ALLE VITE PASSATE
NESSUN RIPOSO, NESSUNA PACE
IL FREDDO TOCCO DELLA MORTE
STUDIARE PERGAMENE DEL NECROMANTE

Né morto né vivo, maledetto e nascosto ad occhi indiscreti, il Velato ha imparato gli stessi poteri che hanno causato la sua condizione. E' pieno di odio verso i non morti, eppure dopo secoli di sofferenza ha il controllo della stessa strana necromanzia. Non è intesa per resuscitare i morti, ma per salvare quelli che non sono ancora defunti. La sua forza cresce man mano che si avvicina alla sua dipartita, e più si accosta a liberarsi dalla sua dannazione, più è difficile mantenere sotto controllo questa energia.

L'unico scopo di questo suo velo è di nascondere il suo corpo empio dalla vista di chiunque. Il bastone aiuta a malapena il Velato a controllare la sua maledizione, e lo forza a sottostare alla sua volontà. La sua spezzalama può sembrare per autodifesa, in realtà il suo scopo è di indebolire ulteriormente i suoi nemici.

Incapace di sentire il calore del fuoco, di assaggiare il cibo o sognare, il Velato evita la compagnia degli altri e viene assorbito dai suoi antichi e incorruttibili ricordi. La solitudine gli porta pace o rafforza i suoi rimpianti. In ogni caso, se necessario, darà la sua forza vitale a chiunque sia più bisognoso di lui.

Un destino peggiore della morte
Uno straniero velato si è avvicinato al nostro Borgo. Anche se non possiamo fidarci della nebbia oscura che si aggrappa a lui, afferma che le sue intenzioni sono benevole.
La Storia di una Tragedia

Il borgo ha organizzato una recita! Il copione ci è stato fornito da un uomo avvolto in dei veli. Racconta la tragedia di un mortale che, colpito dall'avidità, viene condannato ad un fato incerto e sofferente.
La Danse Macabre
Il velo tra la vita e la morte sembra tristemente sottile oggi. Possiamo solamente rivolgere lo sguardo alla coltre di nebbia che affligge il nostro borgo, e pregare per i vivi come per i morti.

PAST LIFE REGRESSION
NO REST, NO PEACE
COLD TOUCH OF DEATH
STUDY NECROMANTIC SCROLLS

Neither dead nor alive, cursed and hiding from prying eyes, the Veiled has learned the same powers that caused his condition. He’s full of hate towards the undead, yet after ages of suffering he is in control of the same strange necromancy. It is not intended for reviving the dead, but for salvaging those not yet departed. His strength grows as he nears death, as the closer he gets to freeing himself from his damnation, the harder it is to keep this energy under control.

The only purpose of his veil is to hide his unholy body from anyone’s sight. The staff merely helps the Veiled to control his curse, and force it to submit to his will. His swordbreaker might seem to be for self-defense, yet its purpose is to weaken his foes even further.

Unable to feel the warmth of fire, taste food, or see dreams, the Veiled eschews others’ company and gets absorbed in his ancient, imperishable memories. Solitude either brings him peace, or strengthens his regrets. But if necessary, he will give his life force to anyone who might need it more than him.

A Fate Worse Than Death
A veiled stranger has approached our Hamlet. While we can not be sure about the black mists that cling to him, he states his intentions are benign.
A Story Of Tragedy
The hamlet has organized a play! The script has been provided by a man wrapped in veils. It tells of a tragedy where a mortal, struck by grief, is left to a fate of uncertainty and sorrow.
La Danse Macabre
The veil between life and death seems woefully thin this week. We can only cast our eyes skyward towards the cloying mists that plague our Hamlet, and pray for the dead and living alike.
How long have I waited! Unmake me! UNMAKE ME NOW!
Pointless! I am senseless!
Insentient and foul.
Disgusting abominations! Your death was defiled!
I've seen this vicious mastery before.
I’ve been there. Don’t make me remember!
She was the gift I’ve never been worthy of…
This is mildly inconvenient.
You're ruining my veils!
There's nothing on me to eat!
I don't need air anyways.
Stop holding and touching me!
I can't swim with these clothes!
We must leave the little pig until last!
Bring death to the prince first!
Fools, do not attack the tiny one!
This will be interesting.
I look forward to the carnage.
Please, blast me to bits!
Bring me over there!
It speaks of doom, but not mine?
Please, foretell my death!
Touch her and I'll rip your bones out of your body.
How can I live without her...
Life is meaningless if she is not with me!
"Take my hand and never leave me..."
(hums)
Wh-where am I?
I saw her again...
This foolish, intoxicating feeling has already ruined my life enough!
This unsightly fish is not nearly as beautiful as she was...
Such a beautiful delusion.
My body is empty, but my soul is trapped!
How mesmerizing! What cruelty!
Turn me into ash!
...Never thought I'd see one like me.
Put him out of his misery! It's a mercy!
You must be grateful that you can feel this pain!
Fascinating...
Torn to pieces!
Turn to dust!
The veil parts for you!
Return to your maker!
Such an exquisite end!
I envy you.
Darkness takes you!
Your life is so easily taken!
HAHAHAHA!
It can’t be... IT CAN’T BE!
I SHOULD BE DEAD, WHY DO I FEEL IT?!
WHY IS SUCH A THROE GIVEN TO ME?!
I bleed...? I BLEED!
OH, HOW I MISSED THIS SENSATION! AHAHA!
I CAN FEEL MY VEINS EMPTY! SUCH BLISS!
Oooh... This sensation, sweeter than any nectar...!
It eats away at my body!
I can see my body dissolve. Fascinating.
Maybe this could turn me to dust.
Hundred years of solitude...
Don't take me back to that day!
She deserved better...
I... need a moment...
His visage haunts me!
I can't control... myself...!
My body is lighter than I am used to!
I drift like a rag on the wind!
I am no novice to dancing, but it's not what I...!
My body moves and sways!
My knees buckle, my head spins!
Oh, wonderful.
Just what I didn't need.
Why do you torture me so?
Forces more vile than mine!
A strength that carries on beyond!
Don't you dare touch me again!
Let us not tarry with their end.
We must bring about their death. Let us not wait.
Death waits for none but I.
Every one of them will fall!
What?!
Are they... dead? Alive? What?
I don't trust this respite...
A scant moment of rest.
A delusion of peace.
MY MIND IS WEAK!
I CAN NOT BEAR IT!
THE DARKNESS IS OVERWHELMING!
This place holds nothing of use to me.
There’s nothing here for me, send me elsewhere.
What a cruel joke.
I ask you to stop tormenting me.
Take me with you, I seek my downfall.
It's a beautiful day to die.
My end is somewhere out there. Please, take me along.
Allow me to accompany your next foray.
I'd have preferred if my mind were unbreakable, rather than my body.
The mind is such a fragile thing... So lamentable.
I knew it would not be easy to find my end.
All I find is horror instead of death.
The mind is so much weaker than the body...
What am I even trying to do?
Even now, the memories of that day haunt me...
Merely existing is such a torture.]
One living corpse is enough.
Someone has to watch over your buried hirelings, don't you think so?
Will I finally meet my end here?
I've come from far to meet my demise here.
Such a dark and desolate place. It suits me well.
Such a somber atmosphere. Perfect.
Take me with you! My death is out there!
Such base merriment.
Fine, fine. I will go.
I guess I've got some parlour tricks.
Time to pick up a new hobby.
Watch my thumb disappear!
What do you mean, "Toss those bones"?
Higher. No, lower.
This place is far too noisy and rowdy.
I've had plenty of solitude. I guess I can do with a bit more.
What's this about breathing in and out?
I shall reflect on my failures and success.
Mortality. Such a complex thing...
Even more time to think.
Wish that I could doze off.
Where is your "Light" now?
I can try, but there is no difference in which tale you believe the most.
The Light didn't save me at a fateful moment, why would it now?
I remain skeptical at most, but alright.
Show yourself, Light. Prove yourself to me.
Such amusing folly.
Hapless sheep need something to believe in.
The mind is fallible. It must be preserved until my demise.
Well, I can't help but feel a bit hollow, you see...
Mists, guide me on this journey of rehabilitation.
So in the end, it all comes down to that day.

It's not just haphephobia.
It makes no sense.
Don't be scared of what you're about to see.

That syringe is useless. Trust me.
Don't bother getting a transfusion.
Hands off! I will operate myself!
Yes! This is perfect!
Incredible! A swift end for me!
Please, I beg you to send me in here!
These weaklings can't even harm me.
How am I to find my end here?
Nothing here would be capable of killing me.
I'll seek my end anywhere EXCEPT there.
To think that even worse fates exist.
My life is a mercy compared to what is down there.
This accursed place is even more foul than I am!
Flesh and stone is infallible, bones and psyche are not.
Fascinating.
Amendable.
Yes, yes. Very good.
How quaint.
I've already tempered my expectations.
Oh well.
Get used to disappointment.
Unfazing.
Oh, no. How awful.
Hm. Less than pleasant.
I'm used to worse.
...And that's all?
Touch me again, I dare you.
My feet are not your pavement!
Careful with my garbs.
Let's find my demise.
Here we go once more.
Onwards, into darkness and death.
Let's go. Something here ought to be my end.
Stop.
Hold on.
Something's amiss.
Rest for my bones.
This familiar darkness.
Torches are spent and snuffed, just like lives.
It's not like I can see much anyways.
A night as hollow as my body.
Don't trip and hit me.
Careful where you go. Wouldn't want you bumping into me.
A beautiful night to meet our demise, no?
They'll fight harder now. Good.
A stygian darkness for fiends of the depths.
The spirit falters...
Yes! Just so! Bring doom upon me!
Condemn me all you wish!

So close, yet I feel nothing.
I feel nothing!

A pity.
So disempowering.
It was not meant to be.
Try even harder.
Again!
I would spit blood in your face if I could.

Beautiful!

(dark, whispered chanting)

At least you aren't a walking corpse.

I don't believe in any gods, but I feel as if something is watching over you.

Death comes in the darkest night!
My end rides on black wings!
Doom is upon us!

Oh to feel that spring in my step!
Flexing those legs!
And I would walk five hundred miles...
Hmm, I don't think I'm ready for that yet.
I'd be boned if you did that!
Maybe, maybe not.
What's wrong with some healthy bloodletting?
So that's how you jump!
Flex those tendons for me!
Seems they got a bone to pick with you!
Can you tell me what it's like?
Ooh, that looked interesting. Me next, please.
Fascinating!
That was a skele-ton of damage!
Ah, how their blood spurts and nerves sever...
But I want to bleed?!
Oh wow, these muscles sure make me swift!
Ah, to feel air on my skin!
My flesh tears!
Am I bleeding yet?
Quick! I must find the wound!
But I'm just starting to enjoy this!
No sudden movements! I think my muscles are cramping!
Oh, is it time for a hearty jog? We must stretch first!
Ah, is that blood spilling?
Oh, why do I not feel pain?
Let's see if I can pinch some flesh...
Oops, clumsy me!
Sorry, not yet used to having flesh!
Hahaha! Oh, the sensations that return!
Strike my flesh, that I may feel pain!
Let me bleed! Come!
Allow me to feel pain once more!
Why can I not sleep?
I am plagued by restlessness.
Insomnia, perhaps? Everything should be fine again!
The joys of feeling flesh!
Ah, warmth fills me!
My blood pumps and lungs swell!
Leave me, I must enjoy this joyous occasion!
Why did the skeleton cross the road?
The joy of feeling fresh air on my skin!
Is this... a scent?
My senses lead me here!
Oh, how light I am on these feet!
Is that skin I feel...?
This makes me shiver and shake!
I must stretch these tendons!
Ennui and listlessness has taken me!
I shall be at the gardens, chasing butterflies.
The moon dances! The sun splits!
I feel my hands! I feel once more!
Our souls shine with a violet hue!
Oh, shards as sharp like glass! Cut my veins open!
This fire is cold, its color is wrong!
Any of you, touch me! Am I still here?
My soul remains black as death. Can you see it?
Is this... me? This reflection? Is it who I was?
Consume me! Leave them alone! They do not understand the delight of pain!
Dance with me, I beg you...
This song! It's too loud!
The colors of your souls are tainted.
Dancing with colour pulls me back.
It's so unearthly beautiful! You must see it closer!
I can't bear to be without this turqouise!
Yes! Burn my vision! Burn my body!
The song of colours calls out to me!
I come, seeking ruination and salvation.
So cold outside... But my bones melt inside.
Such beauty, these empty shells. I wish to be like them.
This colourful humming... Sweet as sirensong...!
See! I told you that blood is purple!
Spill it! Give to the earth! You have so much of it left to give!
This is a mercy you will never understand.
Haha! HAHAHA!
Can these shards damage me? Can they make me feel pain?!
Insanity, free me! Free me from this cage! I am nothing but pure magenta!
The cage tightens!!
Take me first! Take me with you!
Bone makes a wonderful pigment!
Hear my scream! It comes straight from my soul!
It takes much more to free me! Strike again!
Surely full destruction of my cage in one go will end me?
Where am I? Who are you? You do not sound like the cosmos!
You do not look so good...
NO! Return your blood at once! It's feeding the soil!
Do you see them now? Are they as bright and magnificent as all these crystals?
It returned its shape! Much like this cage!
Colours guide your hand as they please.
Now do same to me! DO IT!
I am an empty shell. A prison for the soul.
Once, I was so much more. Now I am but a husk.
This provides no sustenance! I must dine on the colours!
THIS UNIVERSE IS DROWNING IN THE PURPLE OCEAN!!!
THE CAGE SHATTERS!!!
MY DEAR, I AM COMING BACK!!!
Can I borrow your eyes? Mine were lost decades ago.
Do you want to touch my hand? It's blazing hot.
Oh, I must have totally spaced out there.
We speak in different languages.
It's my only chance to see dreams again. Do not bother me.
They call for me to join their dance...
You can't heal my flesh! Are you blind? There is none of it left!
I have no will to live, let me turn into color itself.
Don't touch me! It is only between me and the color!
How amusing that you still have hopes about my condition.
I will not accept anything from meat-stuffed shells.
How do these tints work?
My cage is perfect in its fantastically failed result!
Those work only on flesh.
Give me more crystals to cut my veins with, until they are gone again.
No! I will not repeat this mistake! I will not accept your promise of salvation!
I need it more than you.
Anything can be turned into paint, let me do it.
Certainly this will help me.
Colour calls me for another century of slumber!
Let me go! I have a date with the stars!
I have survived this long. I hold mastery over death!
There is nothing to fear here. If I go, my journey is complete at last.
Sound of mind. Much less sound of body!
Even the darkest depths and coldest nights do not frighten me.
I feel nothing!
I am truly invincible, both in body and mind!
I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!
The normality of our foes is appaling.
Death walks amongst you. You have no need to be afraid of such simple foes.
Let us show them how death truly looks like!
These "monsters" are merely grim playthings.
Woe is them! They have met their infallible end!
Feel no mercy for them. They have it coming.
I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!
As certain as the moon will rise.
Like dusk falls, so will they.
Sharpen your spirit and make them accept their fate.
Go, sever the thread of their life.
The cold chill will help you focus.
Grant them the end I so desire.
I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!
This dark force of me overwhelms all!
Even the strongest of foes crumble before my power!
Accept this painful death!
The fog of death is upon them!
My mists will guide the way!
To the grave with them!
I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!
That which is dead may never die!
What? No, I don't want to be healed!
Endless. Eternal. Deathless!
Ahh, that sweet scent of death.
Damnable healing, let me die already.
Ah, great. The healing is back. Just what I need...
I've been dead much longer than you are! We are nothing alike!
Did it just pierce my ribs?
Oh, look. An egg.
Can't get this egg out of me, hm.
It's moving about!
This egg is hatching!
This is, even by my standards, unreasonably gross.
Oh mists, it's hatched!
Get these bugs out of me!
Something lives inside and I can feel it skittering!
AM I UNDEAD OR MERELY A VESSEL FOR THE BLOOD?!
MY UNLIFE FOR THE CRIMSON FLUID!
Is this sensation... thirst?
I feel as if I could die of thirst, yet I can't!
Have mercy! I AM hollow!
What is this sudden lethargic sensation?
But will it soothe this annoying sensation?
Wish that I could die, this sensation is agonizing!
Nothing could overcome this agonizing sensation.
No, I need that red liquid. I know not why.
Bring me some of that Blood! It's agonizing!
I have no sense of taste, yet I crave the Blood.
Only... The Blood... will do...
Is it Blood...? Oh, nevermind then.
Would you mind if I just nicked your wrist instead? Oh well then...
It doesn’t make any sense!
The only thing that will restore me is The Blood!
All that supports me now is the Blood!
I can not feel thirst, yet all I crave is... Blood!
I have not the strength. Only an inexplicable need for Blood...
No, please, you go ahead. I must rest.
I am simply not interested, unless you think there is Blood to be had...
I know they have blood!
The mists tell me they carry Blood!
Stand aside! I must fulfill this craving!
YES! BLEED FOR US!
TEMPTATION GROWS WITH EACH BLOW!
I WILL DRAIN YOUR BLOOD AND NOTHING WILL STOP ME!
Mmmmmm the wondrous sight of a wound!
Oh gods! That colour! The bright reds of spilt blood!
Please give me some! You're already injured!
Oh! I was not myself for a moment...
Blood... blood... blood... blood...
This sudden craving is so strong... I didn't even notice...
I fear my agony has made my footing unstable.
I am just so tired, please end it now!
It is hopeless, I will never get rid of this sensation.
You are doing great. Sure.
Into the dark with them!
Quit your unreasonable glee.
HAHA!... I mean... Good, yes. Whatever.
No more attention! Enough!
Turn your attention elsewhere.
I have brought enough death for your games.
Dark powers... I know them well.
Faith is such a foolish concept.
There is merit in your words.
One must have power to do as they wish. To shape their own fate.
You and I, we are rather alike.
It's all so clear to me now!
I shall show how to bring about their death!
This blade... Thirsts?!
I hold no blood! It seeks to slake itself on another!
And I thought I was the one eager to die.
Hilarious.
You fail, as expected.
Ever tried to actually aim?
That's all?
Pathetic.
We will walk this road to the end!
I've got an epiphany!
It is me who seeks death! Let me guard you!
Let me take the blow in your stead!
I've seen your strength before. You can do this.
You'll succeed next time. I know it!
I'm not sure what you're expecting me to do with this.
Ah yes, let's try eating. Great idea.
Hold on, how is this possible?!
I'm literally not even skin over bones!
If I can't die, you shall!
Do! Not! Touch! Me!
The only mistake I've made is that I care!
If I can't die, you shall!
Do! Not! Touch! Me!
The only mistake I've made is that I care!
Care to sing a shanty with the dead?
Someone must be the hero who dies first. Pity that it's not going to be me.
The dead must stay dead. You see a problem here?
I will gladly collect your bones when you all perish.
Care to sing a shanty with the dead?
Someone must be the hero who dies first. Pity that it's not going to be me.
The dead must stay dead. You see a problem here?
I will gladly collect your bones when you all perish.

PAST LIFE REGRESSION
NO REST, NO PEACE
COLD TOUCH OF DEATH
STUDY NECROMANTIC SCROLLS

Neither dead nor alive, cursed and hiding from prying eyes, the Veiled has learned the same powers that caused his condition. He’s full of hate towards the undead, yet after ages of suffering he is in control of the same strange necromancy. It is not intended for reviving the dead, but for salvaging those not yet departed. His strength grows as he nears death, as the closer he gets to freeing himself from his damnation, the harder it is to keep this energy under control.

The only purpose of his veil is to hide his unholy body from anyone’s sight. The staff merely helps the Veiled to control his curse, and force it to submit to his will. His swordbreaker might seem to be for self-defense, yet its purpose is to weaken his foes even further.

Unable to feel the warmth of fire, taste food, or see dreams, the Veiled eschews others’ company and gets absorbed in his ancient, imperishable memories. Solitude either brings him peace, or strengthens his regrets. But if necessary, he will give his life force to anyone who might need it more than him.

A Fate Worse Than Death
A veiled stranger has approached our Hamlet. While we can not be sure about the black mists that cling to him, he states his intentions are benign.
A Story Of Tragedy
The hamlet has organized a play! The script has been provided by a man wrapped in veils. It tells of a tragedy where a mortal, struck by grief, is left to a fate of uncertainty and sorrow.
La Danse Macabre
The veil between life and death seems woefully thin this week. We can only cast our eyes skyward towards the cloying mists that plague our Hamlet, and pray for the dead and living alike.
How long have I waited! Unmake me! UNMAKE ME NOW!
Pointless! I am senseless!
Insentient and foul.
Disgusting abominations! Your death was defiled!
I've seen this vicious mastery before.
I’ve been there. Don’t make me remember!
She was the gift I’ve never been worthy of…
This is mildly inconvenient.
You're ruining my veils!
There's nothing on me to eat!
I don't need air anyways.
Stop holding and touching me!
I can't swim with these clothes!
We must leave the little pig until last!
Bring death to the prince first!
Fools, do not attack the tiny one!
This will be interesting.
I look forward to the carnage.
Please, blast me to bits!
Bring me over there!
It speaks of doom, but not mine?
Please, foretell my death!
Touch her and I'll rip your bones out of your body.
How can I live without her...
Life is meaningless if she is not with me!
"Take my hand and never leave me..."
(hums)
Wh-where am I?
I saw her again...
This foolish, intoxicating feeling has already ruined my life enough!
This unsightly fish is not nearly as beautiful as she was...
Such a beautiful delusion.
My body is empty, but my soul is trapped!
How mesmerizing! What cruelty!
Turn me into ash!
...Never thought I'd see one like me.
Put him out of his misery! It's a mercy!
You must be grateful that you can feel this pain!
Fascinating...
Torn to pieces!
Turn to dust!
The veil parts for you!
Return to your maker!
Such an exquisite end!
I envy you.
Darkness takes you!
Your life is so easily taken!
HAHAHAHA!
It can’t be... IT CAN’T BE!
I SHOULD BE DEAD, WHY DO I FEEL IT?!
WHY IS SUCH A THROE GIVEN TO ME?!
I bleed...? I BLEED!
OH, HOW I MISSED THIS SENSATION! AHAHA!
I CAN FEEL MY VEINS EMPTY! SUCH BLISS!
Oooh... This sensation, sweeter than any nectar...!
It eats away at my body!
I can see my body dissolve. Fascinating.
Maybe this could turn me to dust.
Hundred years of solitude...
Don't take me back to that day!
She deserved better...
I... need a moment...
His visage haunts me!
I can't control... myself...!
My body is lighter than I am used to!
I drift like a rag on the wind!
I am no novice to dancing, but it's not what I...!
My body moves and sways!
My knees buckle, my head spins!
Oh, wonderful.
Just what I didn't need.
Why do you torture me so?
Forces more vile than mine!
A strength that carries on beyond!
Don't you dare touch me again!
Let us not tarry with their end.
We must bring about their death. Let us not wait.
Death waits for none but I.
Every one of them will fall!
What?!
Are they... dead? Alive? What?
I don't trust this respite...
A scant moment of rest.
A delusion of peace.
MY MIND IS WEAK!
I CAN NOT BEAR IT!
THE DARKNESS IS OVERWHELMING!
This place holds nothing of use to me.
There’s nothing here for me, send me elsewhere.
What a cruel joke.
I ask you to stop tormenting me.
Take me with you, I seek my downfall.
It's a beautiful day to die.
My end is somewhere out there. Please, take me along.
Allow me to accompany your next foray.
I'd have preferred if my mind were unbreakable, rather than my body.
The mind is such a fragile thing... So lamentable.
I knew it would not be easy to find my end.
All I find is horror instead of death.
The mind is so much weaker than the body...
What am I even trying to do?
Even now, the memories of that day haunt me...
Merely existing is such a torture.]
One living corpse is enough.
Someone has to watch over your buried hirelings, don't you think so?
Will I finally meet my end here?
I've come from far to meet my demise here.
Such a dark and desolate place. It suits me well.
Such a somber atmosphere. Perfect.
Take me with you! My death is out there!
Such base merriment.
Fine, fine. I will go.
I guess I've got some parlour tricks.
Time to pick up a new hobby.
Watch my thumb disappear!
What do you mean, "Toss those bones"?
Higher. No, lower.
This place is far too noisy and rowdy.
I've had plenty of solitude. I guess I can do with a bit more.
What's this about breathing in and out?
I shall reflect on my failures and success.
Mortality. Such a complex thing...
Even more time to think.
Wish that I could doze off.
Where is your "Light" now?
I can try, but there is no difference in which tale you believe the most.
The Light didn't save me at a fateful moment, why would it now?
I remain skeptical at most, but alright.
Show yourself, Light. Prove yourself to me.
Such amusing folly.
Hapless sheep need something to believe in.
The mind is fallible. It must be preserved until my demise.
Well, I can't help but feel a bit hollow, you see...
Mists, guide me on this journey of rehabilitation.
So in the end, it all comes down to that day.
Existential crisis? Me?
It's not just haphephobia.
It makes no sense.
Don't be scared of what you're about to see.
Can this be done without touching me? No?
That syringe is useless. Trust me.
Don't bother getting a transfusion.
Hands off! I will operate myself!
Yes! This is perfect!
Incredible! A swift end for me!
Please, I beg you to send me in here!
These weaklings can't even harm me.
How am I to find my end here?
Nothing here would be capable of killing me.
I'll seek my end anywhere EXCEPT there.
To think that even worse fates exist.
My life is a mercy compared to what is down there.
This accursed place is even more foul than I am!
Flesh and stone is infallible, bones and psyche are not.
Fascinating.
Amendable.
Yes, yes. Very good.
How quaint.
I've already tempered my expectations.
Oh well.
Get used to disappointment.
Unfazing.
Oh, no. How awful.
Hm. Less than pleasant.
I'm used to worse.
...And that's all?
Touch me again, I dare you.
My feet are not your pavement!
Careful with my garbs.
Let's find my demise.
Here we go once more.
Onwards, into darkness and death.
Let's go. Something here ought to be my end.
Stop.
Hold on.
Something's amiss.
Rest for my bones.
This familiar darkness.
Torches are spent and snuffed, just like lives.
It's not like I can see much anyways.
A night as hollow as my body.
Don't trip and hit me.
Careful where you go. Wouldn't want you bumping into me.
A beautiful night to meet our demise, no?
They'll fight harder now. Good.
A stygian darkness for fiends of the depths.
The spirit falters...
Yes! Just so! Bring doom upon me!
Condemn me all you wish!
This suffering is meaningless!
Cease the torment and end me!
What is dead may never die!
So close, yet I feel nothing.
I feel nothing!
I am deprived of the gift of life! I cannot lose it!
A pity.
So disempowering.
It was not meant to be.
Try even harder.
Again!
I would spit blood in your face if I could.
It's like hitting sacks of hay, isn't it?
Beautiful!
Feel the life that yet clings to you.
You spill life so easily.
Cease your bragging.
Try not to actually die.
Oh yes, I am very envious.
Excellent work. You did not die.
Oh. How anticlimactic.
Commendable display. Now cease torturing me.
Past memories... Times in which everything was well...
I shall depart my body. Do not interrupt me.
The person who dares touch me while meditating, dies.
I am wretched and infallible.
No rest for the wicked.
Rest is for the living. Vengeance is for the undead.
I shall begrudingly let you touch my hand for this ritual.
(dark, whispered chanting)
Feel the uncaring cold of death, and shrug it off.
Guess it's an all-nighter as usual.
I'll stay watch. I have some time to kill anyways.
It never hurts to be doubly prepared.
At least you aren't a walking corpse.
Oh, it could be so much worse!
What I wouldn't give to be warm and cozy like you right now.

Sorry, I don't really know how to treat flesh wounds.
This bone goes there, but what about this organ?
Fate is something you defy.
I don't believe in any gods, but I feel as if something is watching over you.
Know that you have my full support in this journey to get me killed.
Death comes in the darkest night!
My end rides on black wings!
Doom is upon us!
This is a nightmare for us all!
Our minds falter and bones shake.
Prison of flesh or bone, neither protects the soul.
Good to see you are all doing well. Good to see...
I do believe we've got this under control.
A strong mind makes for a strong body.
We are close to our ends!
Aaah, the thrill of release!
We are so close to our sweet unmaking!
You've got plenty of blood to spill. Wish I still could.

So hale and hearty. How good for you.
I am close to my end! I can feel it!
Soon... Soon...!
At last, I am close to my death. Tomorrow, let me meet it.
I'm still far away from my demise.
Why do you keep me alive? Please, stop treating me.
Wish I'd taken more blows.
Excellent. My soul will not fall before my cage does.
I am prepared to meet my end head-on.
Like this, I can go without regrets.
These hands still have much left to do...
Her face... I... I...
What will I leave behind? A legacy, or her ruin?
We are in excellent condition. Onwards, let's find my end - and soon!
Mists carry and guide us. They shall lead us to deliverance.
Woe to those who face us. Only the worthy shall end me.
This is how we shall all meet our end!
It seems misery does love company.
Isn't it exhilarating? To have one foot in the grave?
No more respite. We march to my end.
The warmth of the fire is behind us, now.
Good, finally we can get about to meeting my maker.

Hm. We need more sustenance to last all of you.

Excellent. Sustenance to last a long while.

Seems like no one's about to starve anytime soon.
Plenty of wood left for a second campfire.
Oh, great, yet another excuse to set up camp and dally.
Mayhaps we could use all this firewood to burn me to ash. No?
This place is worse than I've imagined. Still, you are doing just fine.
Excellent work today, all of you. Now rest.
This reminds me of that time in the Warrens--just without all the swine.
I am glad I got to experience this together with you all.
When I finally die, it shall be smiling by your sides.
Must... Touch... !
What have we got here?
Something to lay my hands on!
And what could this be?
Fascinating!
How droll. Let me see.
I wonder if this could empower me...
Oh, the sins I've committed...
No one will notice.
This could assist in my doom!
Maybe the Light could help me, after all?
At last, a chance to cleanse these veils.
What a fantastic way to inflict death upon myself!
Such wonderful garbs and striking poise!
I shall be entombed with riches!
Wait, why do I need to drink?

Oh, how it still has flesh on its bones!
I'm honestly not sure why, but I must try it!
Maybe it holds clues on my demise!

Somehow, I feel like hoarding food.

THE WEAKNESS OF THE PSYCHE!
(gasps)

Don't get close to me!
Please, no closer!

Will I be made to suffer?
The mists holds no power to protect you.
You fool!
Now what will they do to me?
Expect a painful retaliation.
They won't make this mistake twice!
They toy with me!
They know I am but an immortal plaything.
Why do I not feel pain?!
I am merely a plaything!
Condemned to an eternity of this anguish!
Please, do not stress me out further.
I wish I could sleep...
Another dark night, alone with my thoughts.
What am I to do?
I'm trying to think of a god to pray to!
No, this can't be happening!
Get me away from these horrible specters!
I can not bear the sight of them!
I no longer wish to partake in this!
I'm in no hurry to meet my end!
I-It can wait, trust me!

I know you're trying to look under the veil!
Stop tugging at my clothes!
Touch me one more time and I'll cut your hands off!
I KNEW IT! I NEVER SHOULD HAVE TRUST-
DON'T TOUCH ME! DO NOT TOUCH ME!
STOP CLAWING AT ME!
Let go of my garbs!
Stop staring at me!
Keep your hands where they belong!
Is this blighted, perhaps?
Are you so sadistic as to remind me of my past life?
I don't need this, and you should know.
Stay away, or I will cast you into the fire!
(holds up his swordbreaker in a threatening gesture)
You shall not stare under the veil!
My threats are not merely hot air.
I warned you that I wouldn't help. Yet, you all kept it up.
I will not be touching nor helping anyone at all tonight.
Back off!
I do not need this "help" of yours.
Your elbow nearly touched me!
I don't need your flimsy excuses!
Touch me and you lose that hand.
I need no "ministrations" of yours!
Stay away!
Don't get so close!
Keep your distance from me!
Don't you dare administer that to me!
I'll use items myself! Get away!
You carry no permission to touch me, remember?
Your feet will not touch mine!
Keep your damnable feet where they belong!
Budge even an inch closer and I will stab you.
The mists whisper secrets!
Very clever.
I can sense the beating of your lying heart.
Playing up this scheme, huh?
Your actions will not trick me!
I see past the veil of your lies.
You know what happens to those who dare touch me?!
Try that again! I will MURDER you!
Oh mists, they nearly touched me!
THEY TOUCHED ME!!
HOW DARE YOU?!
I SHALL HAVE THEIR HEADS! RIGHT THIS MOMENT!!
That diversion won't work on me!
You think I haven't picked up on your clever scheme?
Darkness cries out at your infidelity!
This is what you get for touching me!
They were not empty threats!
Repent for your wandering hands!
Stay at least five meters away!
Don't even dare look my way.
I'll find out what you are scheming.
Do not even think about it!
I sense trickery!
I know what you are scheming!
That is merely a ruse!
I will not suffer your petty tricks.
You hold no sway over my power.
I TOLD YOU TO STOP TOUCHING ME!
(frantic movements)
You! I must get away from you!
I will not partake in your scheme!
Send another fool in my stead!
I will not slaver away for your wicked games!
AHAHAHAHA!
Try and tear me apart!
My immortal husk shall take all your beatings!
ONLY THE SOUL IS PERISHABLE!
UNLIKE MY BODY, THE PSYCHE FALTERS!
MY MIND IS MY SOLE WEAKNESS!
Kill me! Kill me, at last!
Just try to murder me!
I can not die! I am already dead!
I need my health to be lower!
No thanks, they're pointless.
I don't need useless rations.
You may try, but I refuse!
Stop actively making it worse!
Why are you so insistent on prolonging my suffering?
We'll be fine!
Neither me nor you have need for this.
Nothing can help prevent your deaths.
Do not veil my pain any further!
But why? I long for death!
Do not toy with me!
I am trying to die over here!
Why would you do that?
I'm currently trying to meet my end.
Hmm... Not lethal enough.
This trap is pathetic. Not enough.
Ooh, visceral. Interesting.
Could this unmake me?

Seems a bit impractical, but I could try this...
Come and strike this fiend down!
Kill this wretched monster!
Unmake me at once, you monster!

Death comes to us all!

Only combat can get me killed!

Slay this cursed wanderer!

Why was I made immortal?!
I crave death!
No! Not while I still hold wicked life!

Yes! Bring me closer to death!
Unmake me further!
Envelop me in the darkness of death!

Me next! Me next!
Shatter me and break me to dust!

I need no ministrations!
These are wasted upon me!

Let us meet my end!
Let us move towards my demise!

I sit amidst ignorant fleshlings.
The flesh on your bones marks you.
You don't know how good you have it, ignorant fools.
YOU PESTILENT HUSKS!
YOU DAMNABLE FLESHBAGS!
YOU ROTTEN FODDER!
Savor your life while it lasts.
You dumb, incompetent fools.
I would rather be dead than incapable like you.
Not by a meatsack like you.

No, your inadequacies do not help.
Learn to fight with your own strength.
Leave me alone, before I turn my power upon you.
You piles of guts and flesh do not deserve my help.
Get moving with those meaty legs!
Move those useless feet.
Get a move on already!
I don't think so, guts for brains.
No, you shall not, fool.
You are an idiot to think I would. Phah!
Your just dessert, pig.
Just don't bleed on my veil.
Ugh, the idiot bleeds. How enviable.
A pathetic strike.
You take life without grace.
There is no skill in how you bring death.
Absolutely worthless.
You miss, much like you miss a purpose.
We would be better off without this bloodbag.
I shall make you enjoy pain!
Appreciate the gift of your weak flesh!
Suffer! It makes life all the better!
You weaklings need rest?
Oh, right. The mortals need their pitiful sleep.
Rest is for the living - and truly weak ones at that.
The dead have no pity for you!
Try to keep up, fleshbags.
My logic is simply above your simple minds.
I can't bear to walk among these simpletons.
This Hamlet is full of the unwashed, uneducated masses.
This place is awful. I'd rather die in a ditch.
Alone, our hero stands against the storm!
This bleak tale needs a protagonist!
I shall lead this tale! Hahaha!
AND SO, IN THE DARKEST PEAK, OUR HERO FALTERS!
A TRAGIC END TO THIS WOEFUL TALE!
WILL OUR HERO PERISH OR PERSEVERE?!
Witness the clash between these vile forces!
The sound of combat! How utterly delightful!
Shrieks and groans! Bloodied hacking and laboured breathing!

For my efforts, of course.
Spoils for our hero!
Our entourage wanders on!
Thus our hero continued his journey.
The dark knight travels on!

How will our valiant knight get out of this?

This is where you'll all die. In the dark.
It does not matter.
We are all but figments and dust.

I beg you to put me out of my mercy.
Unmake my soul, if you can not end my body.
The mists that bind me are too powerful.
(sighs, forlorn)
How cruel this life is to me.
All I wished for was a happy ending.
I should have gone elsewhere.
I seek my end, but I am woefully unprepared.
Am I merely escaping from my wrongdoings without facing reality?

Ни мертвый, ни живой, проклятый и прячущийся от посторонних глаз, Завуалированный познал те же силы, которые обрекли его на проклятье. Он полон ненависти к нежити, но после многих веков страданий он использует ту же странную магию, магию некромантии. Она предназначена в его руках не для воскрешения мертвых, а для спасения тех, кто еще не умер. Его сила растет по мере того, как он приближается к смерти, и чем ближе он приближается к освобождению от своего проклятия, тем труднее держать эту энергию под контролем.

Единственное предназначение его вуали - скрытие его нечестивого тела от чьего-либо взгляда. Посох же помогает Завуалированному контролировать свое проклятие и заставить его подчиняться своей воле. Может показаться, что его мечелом для самообороны, но его цель состоит в том, чтобы еще больше ослабить его врагов.

Не чувствуя тепла огня, не чувствуя вкуса пищи и не видя снов, Завуалированный избегает общества других и погружается в свои древние, нетленные воспоминания. Одиночество либо приносит ему покой, либо усиливает его сожаления. Но в случае необходимости он отдаст свою жизненную силу любому, кому она может понадобиться больше, чем ему.

Никаких резких движений! Кажется, у меня сводит мышцы!
О, неужели пришло время для бодрой пробежки? Сначала надо размяться!
Ах, это льется кровь?
Ой, почему я не чувствую боли?
Посмотрим, смогу ли я ущипнуть немного плоти...
Ой, я какой-то неуклюжий...
Прости, еще не привык к плоти!
Ха-ха-ха! Мои ощущения возвращаются!
Порази мою плоть, чтобы я почувствовал боль!
Дайте моей плоти кровоточить! Подходите!
Позволь мне еще раз почувствовать боль!
Почему я не могу уснуть?
Меня мучает тревога.

Ах, тепло наполняет меня!
Моя кровь льется по венам, а легкие вздуваются!

Почему скелет перешел дорогу?
Какая радость ощущать свежий воздух на своей коже!
Это...запах?

Это кожа, которую я чувствую? ..
Это заставляет меня дрожать и трястись!
Я должен растянуть эти сухожилия!
Тоска и апатия овладели мною!
Я буду в саду, бегать за бабочками.
Луна танцует! Солнце раскалывается!
Я чувствую свои руки! Я снова чувствую!
Наши души сияют фиолетовым цветом!
Осколки острые, как стекло! Вскройте мне вены!
Этот огонь холодный, его цвет неправильный!
Любой из вас, прикоснитесь ко мне! Я все еще здесь?
Моя душа остается черной, как смерть. Ты видишь это?
Это...я? Мое отражение? Это то, кем я был?
Поглоти меня! Оставь их в покое! Они не понимают радости боли!

Танец с цветом тянет меня назад.

Такая красота, эти пустые раковины. Я хочу быть похожим на них.
Это красочное жужжание... Сладкое, как песня сирены...!
Смотри! Я же говорил тебе, что кровь пурпурная!

Это милость, которую вы никогда не поймете.
Ха-ха! ХАХАХА!

У меня нет воли к жизни, позвольте мне превратиться в цвет.
